br.inf.ufes.lar.thtbot

Class THTMonitorBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • br.inf.ufes.lar.thtbot.THTMonitorBot

  • public class THTMonitorBot
extends Observable
    This class is responsible to fetch all the stats generate by the monitor source.

    The stats are available in a HTML5 webpage. Inittially, the stats data is available in a TEMPERATURE:HUMIDITY:TENSION format. You can always implement your own fetch method by overriding the setStats() method. This class extends Observable class to implement the Observer design pattern.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leonardo Lemos
    See Also:
    Observable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      THTMonitorBot(String monitorUrl)
      Creates a new THTMonitor by initializing all the stats to '0', creating a list of observers and assigning a stats webpage URL to the class instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserver(Observer o)
      Adds a new Observer to the Observers List.
      void deleteObserver(Observer o)
      Removes an Observer from the Observers List.
      void notifyObservers()
      Notify all the Observers in the Observers List for temperature, humidity and tension.
      void setStats()
      Reads the stats from the stats page, updates the temperature, humidity and tension instances and notify all the observers about the changes made to it.

      • Methods inherited from class java.util.Observable

        addObserver, clearChanged, countObservers, deleteObserver, deleteObservers, hasChanged, notifyObservers, setChanged

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
